original_text: He will take the images of their gods back to Egypt with him. He will also take away valuable things that they had made from gold and silver. Then for several years, he will not attack the king of the north again.
korean_text: 그 신들과 부어 만든 우상들과 은과 금의 아름다운 그릇들은 다 노략하여 애굽으로 가져갈 것이요 몇 해 동안은 그가 북방 왕을 치지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: He will take the images of their gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들의 신들의 상들을 가져갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will also take away valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 귀중한 것들을 가져갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that they had made from gold and silver
he will not attack the king of the north again
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다시는 북쪽 왕을 공격하지 않을 것입니다
